Class ec.ez.ezvm.DispatchExpr

                   +----ec.ez.ezvm.DispatchExpr
public class DispatchExpr
extends Expr
BNF: "dispatch" "{" method* [ match ] "}"

Yields an object that closes over the current scope, and responds to requests by dispatching to one of its matching methods, or to match if provided and none match.

DispatchExpr(DispatchExpr, Object)
